author: Nintendo of America
description:
DRAGON QUEST I & II HD-2D Remake is coming to Nintendo Switch and Nintendo Switch 2 on Oct 30, 2025.  

New adventures await the descendants of the hero, Erdrick! DRAGON QUEST I & II HD-2D Remake is a stunning reimagining of the first two legendary adventures in The Erdrick Trilogy, brought together in one package. 

#DRAGONQUEST #NintendoSwitch #NintendoSwitch2 

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

title: DRAGON QUEST I & II HD-2D Remake – Erdrick's Legacy Trailer – Nintendo Switch 2
